name: Beavertown
description: Beavertown Brewery is a British brewery based in Tottenham, London. Beavertown was founded in 2011 by Logan Plant, the son of Robert Plant, singer with Led Zeppelin. In June 2018, it was announced that Heineken would be buying a minority stake, so that Beavertown could spend £40 million on a new brewery and visitor site. The new brewery was launched in 2020, with a capacity of 500,000 hectolitres, a ten-fold increase in their previous capacity. Beavertown currently produce mostly IPAs, with special seasonal beers on rotation.
address: unit 18, Lockwood Industrial Park, Mill Mead Road, Tottenham Hale, London N17 9QP G

name: Belleville Brewing Co
description: The Belleville Brewing Co. was set up by ten dads, all with children at Belleville primary school, south west London.
address: 44 Jaggard Way, Balham, London SW12 8SG, United Kingdom

name: Brixton Brewery
description: BROUGHT TO LIFE BY THE INTREPID WINDRUSH GENERATION, BIRTHPLACE OF LEGENDARY DAVID BOWIE, BELOVED FOR ITS VIBRANT MARKETS AND FREEWHEELING NIGHTLIFE, THIS IS BRIXTON IN ALL ITS GLORY. Our beer is hand-crafted in small batches and is always unpasteurised and unfiltered for maximum flavour. We like to add a modern twist to traditional brewing styles, using the best ingredients that we can get our hands on, whether sourced from our local markets, or much further afield. The resulting beers are bold, modern, and always perfectly balanced for easy-drinking.
address: Unit 1, Off Dylan Rd, Milkwood Rd, Brixton, London SE24 0HL, United Kingdom

name: By The Horns Brewing Co.
description:
Founded in London in 2011, we set out to put London brewing back on the map. We have a progressively traditional attitude to confront the status quo of regular boring beer. Combining flavour, tradition, skill & experience in a forward thinking manner striving for beer & brewing perfection.
 Our Core Line-up focusses on approachable styles that are packed full of flavour, with both traditional influence & new-age brewing approaches; with our seasonal & one-off releases looking to push the boundaries of beer flavours & styles.
address: 21 Summerstown, London SW17 0BQ, United Kingdom

name: Camden Town Brewery
description: Camden Town Brewery is a Camden, London-based brewery founded in 2010, and owned by Anheuser-Busch InBev since 2015. The brewery was founded by Jasper Cuppaidge (born 1975), the grandson of Laurie McLaughlin, who ran McLaughlin’s Brewery in Rockhampton, Australia from 1910-1960, along with an estate of 60 pubs.
address: 55 Wilkin Street Mews, Kentish Town, London NW5 3ED, United Kingdom

name: CRATE Brewery
description: Craft brewery with a taproom and pizzeria, situated canal side in Hackney Wick, London
address: Unit 7, Queen's Yard, Hackney Wick, London E9 5EN, United Kingdom

name: East London Brewing Company
description: Welcome to the East London Brewing Company. We are a 25BBL microbrewery, brewing quality beers for cask, keg, bottle and can for distribution throughout London, the UK and beyond in truly timeless, British tradition.
address: Fairways Business Park, Lammas Rd, Leyton, London E10 7QB, United Kingdom

name: Fourpure Brewing Co
description: The Fourpure story is a simple but inspiring one – two brothers with a passion for travel and adventure, looking to share their experiences of good times, great beer and welcoming hospitality, at home in London. In 2012 Dan, an avid homebrewer and beer enthusiast, was looking to find an outlet for his craft, whilst brother Tom, travelling the West Coast of the U.S., was experiencing the open road and front line of the modern beer scene. Inspired by the daring and innovative methods adopted by modern breweries and a passion for flavour, Dan and Tom set up Fourpure in 2013 with the goal of sharing this passion, making good beer accessible and taking beer lovers on a journey to explore new tastes and flavours
address: Bermondsey Trading Estate, 22 Rotherhithe New Rd, Bermondsey, London SE16 3LL, United Kingdom

name: Hackney Brewery
description: Our current brew house was installed in 2016 and is a bespoke build designed by Jon and Pete. We currently have ten 2500 litre fermenting vessels with temperature and pressure control enabling perfect management of the fermenting process. 2016 also saw the installation of laboratory facilities. Every batch or beer is tested for alcohol content, bitterness and carbonation levels ensuring consistency and quality across our range.
address: 358 Laburnum St, Hoxton, London E2 8BB, United Kingdom

name: Hawkes Brewery
description: Relaxed, rustic & wood-clad taproom for ciders & flights plus stonebaked pizza & cheese boards.
address: 86 Druid St, Bermondsey, London SE1 2HQ, United Kingdom

name: Hop Stuff Brewery
description: Based in South East London, Hop Stuff is crowd funded from the start with 3 satellite Taprooms, and plans for many more. Head to these Taprooms for the Hop Stuff range, a slew of guest taps, and face-melting pizza.
address: 35 White Hart Triangle Estate, White Hart Ave, London SE28 0GU, United Kingdom

name: Howling Hops
description: We’ve been passionate about good beer for many years. Initially drinking it, then selling it at the Southampton Arms, and eventually onto brewing it. At the Southampton Arms we realised how much demand there was for interesting beer. There was some good stuff out there back in 2008 but the majority was pretty boring. We knew if we could brew some great beer, selling it would be no problem. All we needed was some space and a brew kit.
address: Unit 9A Queen's Yard, White Post Ln, Hackney Wick, London E9 5EN, United Kingdom

name: London Beer Factory
description: Progressive & independent beer. Crafted in South East London.
address: 160 Hamilton Rd, Norwood, London SE27 9SF, United Kingdom

name: London Beer Lab
description:
INDEPENDENT MICROBREWERY, TAPROOM AND WORKSHOPS
 A beer lovers paradise. 14 line taproom with bottles and cans from some of our favourite indie breweries alongside our own award winning beers. Brewing workshops and tasting experiences available.
address: Arch 41, Railway Arches, Nursery Rd, Ferndale, London SW9 8BP, United Kingdom

name: London Fields brewery
description: Craft brewery with tours of the premises, a brewing school, tutored tasting sessions and a bar.
address: London Fields Brewery, 365 Warburton St, London E8 3RR, United Kingdom

name: Meantime Brewing Company
description: State-of-the-art craft brewery with guided site tours, tutored tastings, plus pie and a pint nights.
address: Lawrence Trading Estate, Blackwall Ln, Greenwich Peninsula, London SE10 0AR, United Kingdom

name: Portobello Brewing Co
description:
PROUDLY INDEPENDENT
 … and owned by an experienced team. Portobello are dedicated to brewing beautifully balanced beers with full flavour, endless drinkability and consistency from one glass to the next.
address: 6, Mitre Way, London W10 6AU, United Kingdom

name: Pressure Drop Brewing
description:
Pressure Drop kicked off back in 2013, going from humble beginnings in a Hackney garden shed to a small but mighty 20BBL brewery in Tottenham. 
 
 We're a small team of people making the best beer that we can, in styles that we want to enjoy, and hope that you will too.
address: Unit 6, Lockwood Industrial Park, Mill Mead Rd, London N17 9QP, United Kingdom

name: The Five Points Brewing Company
description:
The Five Points Brewing Company is an independent brewery based in Hackney, London, brewing with a commitment to quality and the community since 2013.
 
 We champion flavour, provenance, consistency and quality, and our range of award-winning beers are unfiltered and unpasteurised for a better flavour and aroma. Our beers are inspired by the founders’ passion for both the British real ale tradition and the best of the international craft beer movement. Our flagship beers are complemented by regular limited and small batch releases including our barrel-aged project.
address: 61 Mare St, Hackney, London E8 4RG, United Kingdom

name: The Gipsy Hill Brewing Co.
description: NESTLED AT THE BASE OF GIPSY HILL, IN SOUTH LONDON, WE BREW FULL FLAVOURED, MOREISH BREWS OF THE HIGHEST STANDARD. EVERY DECISION WE MAKE IS LED BY IMPROVING QUALITY, PUSHING INNOVATION AND ENGAGING WITH OUR COMMUNITY
address: Unit 5, 160 Hamilton Rd, Norwood, London SE27 9SF, United Kingdom

name: The Kernel Brewery
description: The brewery springs from the need to have more good beer. Beer deserving of a certain attention. Beer that forces you to confront and consider what you are drinking. Upfront hops, lingering bitternesses, warming alcohols, bodies of malt. Lengths and depths of flavour. We make Pale Ales, India Pale Ales and old school London Porters and Stouts towards these ends. Bottled alive, to give them time to grow.
address: Arch 11, Dockley Road Industrial Estate, Dockley Rd, Bermondsey, London SE16 3SF, United Kingdom

name: The Real Al Company
description:
THE REAL AL COMPANY FOUNDED IN 2012, IS DEDICATED TO SOURCING HIGH QUALITY, SMALL BATCH BEER AND CIDER.
 REAL ‘AL’ STANDS FOR ALICE, ORIGINALLY A ONE-WOMAN BAND PASSIONATE ABOUT DELIVERING HEREFORDSHIRE’S FINEST PRODUCTS TO THE REST OF THE COUNTRY. IT ALL BEGAN WITH FLOGGING CASK ALE INTO LONDON, WHICH SOON DIVERSIFIED INTO CIDER GIVEN HER HEREFORDSHIRE ROOTS!
address: Unit 4, Ravenswood Industrial Estate, Shernhall St, Walthamstow, London E17 9HQ, United Kingdom

name: Twickenham Fine Ales
description: Brewery using global hops, established in 2004, with a bar open before certain rugby matches.
address: 18 Mereway Rd, Twickenham TW2 6RG, United Kingdom

name: Villages Brewery
description: VILLAGES WAS STARTED IN 2016 BY ARCHIE AND LOUIS VILLAGE. WE BRING PEOPLE TOGETHER TO DO THINGS THAT BRING PEOPLE TOGETHER... We're a business started by two brothers, and we aim to offer that level of friendship, trust and openness to all. It’s a very happy accident that our name suggests people living together.
address: 21 Resolution Way, Deptford, London SE8 4NT, United Kingdom

name: Volden Brewery
description: Micro Brewery in Croydon, London
address: 35 Neville Rd, Croydon CR0 2DS, United Kingdom

name: Wild Card Brewery
description: Wild Card Brewery was founded in 2012. We make award-winning beer and normally serve it up at The Barrel Store, our Lockwood Taproom, many bottle shops, restaurants, bars & pubs around the country
address: 2 Lockwood Way, Walthamstow, London E17 5RB, United Kingdom

name: Wimbledon Brewery
description: Breathing new life into a brewery ravaged by fire in 1889,we have created an extraordinary collectionof beautifully balanced beers.
address: Unit 8, College Fields Business Centre, 19 Prince Georges Rd, London SW19 2PT, United Kingdom
